title: Darkness of Hallowvale/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: Items needed: 2 planks, 8 nails and a hammer

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Darkness of Hallowvale/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Go to Burgh de Rott and into the basement of the pub there and speak to Veliaf Hurtz.
Official difficultyExperienced
DescriptionFighting tooth and nail against the vampyre overlord, Drakan, the Myreque have moved their secret base camp to Burgh de Rott. Now the fight starts in earnest! Veliaf needs someone to make their way into the Sanguinesti region, the eastern side of Morytania cut off from the west behind an impenetrably huge wall.

Will the fight be supported by Myreque resistance inside the vampyres' domain? What grim discoveries are to be found behind that dread wall? And what of the Vyrewatch - deadly sky-bound patrollers of the blood-tithed lands of Meiyerditch?

Only a daring, quick-witted agent with an eye for detail can hope to pick their way through the tumbled down slums of Meiyerditch.
Official lengthLong
Requirements
  • Completion of the following quests:
    • In Aid of the Myreque
      • In Search of the Myreque
        • Nature Spirit
          • Priest in Peril
          • The Restless Ghost
  • 5 Construction (boostable)
  • 20 Mining (not boostable)
  • 22 Thieving (not boostable) Note: The level 22 Thieving requirement to begin the quest is boostable, but unhooking the latch in Meiyerditch requiring 22 Thieving cannot be boosted.
  • 26 Agility (boostable) Note: The level 26 Agility requirement to begin the quest is boostable, but the unboostable obstacles within Meiyerditch only require 25 Agility. Therefore, 25 Agility is the lowest level possible to complete the quest.
  • 32 Crafting (not boostable)
  • 33 Magic (boostable)
  • 40 Strength (not boostable)
  • The ability to withstand several melee attacks from a level 169 enemy.
Items required
  • 8 nails
  • 2 planks
  • Hammer
  • Knife (obtainable during the quest) or a sickle
  • Means to cast Telekinetic Grab (air and law rune -- both obtainable during the quest)
Recommended
  • 50 Combat level
  • Stamina or energy potions to traverse through the maze of houses
  • Pickaxe, highly recommended, to take a great shortcut through the city (obtainable during quest)
  • Fast travel to several locations
    • Burgh de Rott (Mort'ton teleport, Shades of Mort'ton grouping teleport or Morytania legs 3+, Barrows teleport (tablet))
    • Paterdomus (Salve Graveyard teleport, Fairy rings to cks or Kharyrll Teleport)
    • Varrock (Varrock teleport -- runes for this teleport are provided during the quest)
  • Vyrewatch outfit (top, legs and shoes) as disguise against the Vyrewatch, only if your Thieving or Hitpoints is low (can be bought for 1,950 from Trader Sven during the quest)
  • Armour and some food or 43+ Prayer to use Protect from Melee
Enemies to defeat None - however, Vanstrom Klause (level 169) needs to be fought until he has attacked you 5 times (whether or not he hits or misses), and it is very possible to die.
{"requirements":"*Completion of the following quests:\n**[[In Aid of the Myreque]]\n***[[In Search of the Myreque]]\n****[[Nature Spirit]]\n*****[[Priest in Peril]]\n*****[[The Restless Ghost]]\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Construction\" data-level=\"5\">[[File:Construction icon.png|21x21px|link=Construction|alt=Construction]] 5 [[Construction]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Mining\" data-level=\"20\">[[File:Mining icon.png|21x21px|link=Mining|alt=Mining]] 20 [[Mining]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is not boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">not boostable</span>)</sup>\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Thieving\" data-level=\"22\">[[File:Thieving icon.png|21x21px|link=Thieving|alt=Thieving]] 22 [[Thieving]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is not boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">not boostable</span>)</sup> <small>Note: The level 22 Thieving requirement to begin the quest is boostable, but unhooking the latch in Meiyerditch requiring 22 Thieving cannot be boosted.</small>\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Agility\" data-level=\"26\">[[File:Agility icon.png|21x21px|link=Agility|alt=Agility]] 26 [[Agility]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup> <small>Note: The level 26 Agility requirement to begin the quest is boostable, but the unboostable obstacles within Meiyerditch only require 25 Agility. Therefore, 25 Agility is the lowest level possible to complete the quest.</small>\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Crafting\" data-level=\"32\">[[File:Crafting icon.png|21x21px|link=Crafting|alt=Crafting]] 32 [[Crafting]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is not boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">not boostable</span>)</sup>\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Magic\" data-level=\"33\">[[File:Magic icon.png|21x21px|link=Magic|alt=Magic]] 33 [[Magic]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Strength\" data-level=\"40\">[[File:Strength icon.png|21x21px|link=Strength|alt=Strength]] 40 [[Strength]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is not boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">not boostable</span>)</sup>\n*The ability to withstand several melee attacks from a level 169 enemy.","desc":"Fighting tooth and nail against the vampyre overlord, Drakan, the Myreque have moved their secret base camp to Burgh de Rott. Now the fight starts in earnest! Veliaf needs someone to make their way into the Sanguinesti region, the eastern side of Morytania cut off from the west behind an impenetrably huge wall.\n\nWill the fight be supported by Myreque resistance inside the vampyres' domain? What grim discoveries are to be found behind that dread wall? And what of the Vyrewatch - deadly sky-bound patrollers of the blood-tithed lands of Meiyerditch?\n\nOnly a daring, quick-witted agent with an eye for detail can hope to pick their way through the tumbled down slums of Meiyerditch.","difficulty":"Experienced","kills":"None - however, [[Vanstrom_Klause#Vampyre|Vanstrom Klause]] (level 169) needs to be fought until he has attacked you 5 times (whether or not he hits or misses), and it is very possible to die.","name":"Darkness of Hallowvale/Quick guide","start":"Go to [[Burgh de Rott]] and into the basement of the pub there and speak to [[Veliaf Hurtz]].","length":"Long","items":"*8 [[nails]]\n*2 [[plank]]s\n*[[Hammer]]\n*[[Knife]] (obtainable during the quest) or a [[sickle]]\n*Means to cast [[Telekinetic Grab]] ([[air]] and [[law rune]] -- both obtainable during the quest)"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Starting out[edit | edit source]

Items needed: 2 planks, 8 nails and a hammer

  • Travel to Burgh de Rott.
  • Talk to Veliaf Hurtz in the Burgh de Rott pub basement. ( 4•1•1•2•3•4•5)…
    4Is there something I can do to help out?
    1Yes, please tell me more.
    1What is the Sanguinesti region?
    2How can I search for the Sanguinesti order of the Myreque?
    3Can you tell me about the Sanguinesti Myreque?
    4How should I get into the Sanguinesti region?
    5Okay, thanks.
  • Go south-east to the docks where there's a hut with a boat in it.
  • Use a plank on the boat.
  • Use a plank on the boat chute.
  • Push the boat down the chute, then board it.

Welcome to Meiyerditch[edit | edit source]

Note: While in Meiyerditch if you are provoked by a Vyrewatch you can log out to avoid any interactions with them.

  • Go north-west a short distance (still on the pier), search the floor then kick it down and climb down.
  • Climb over the wall rubble and talk to any Meiyerditch citizen. ( 4•4•4)…
    4(whisper) Do you know about the Myreque?
    4(whisper) I really need to meet the Myreque.
    4How can Old Man Ral help me?
  • Talk to Old Man Ral to the north. ( 4•4)…
    4Someone said you could help me.
    4Old Man Ral, the sage of Sanguinesti.
  • Climb up the ladder in the building south-west of Old Man Ral.

The sickle logo agility course[edit | edit source]

A map of Meiyerditch.

Items Needed: Knife (obtainable during the course)

  • Click on the following actions to mark them as completed
  • Jump south to the floorboards.
  • Jump east to the floorboards.
  • Go to the north-east corner of the room, push the wall and go across the gap.
  • Crawl under the wall to the north.
  • Go north to the second room, look on the west side, push the wall and walk across it.
  • Climb down the ladder.
  • Search the table next to the wall, open the trapdoor table, and climb into it.
  • Climb up the shelf.
  • Crawl under the wall to the east side.
  • Jump to the floorboards to the east.
  • Climb down the ladder.
  • Search the pots near the eastern door to get a door key and use it to open the door.
  • Climb up the ladder in the room to the east.
  • Jump south to the floorboards.
  • Go east, south, west and climb up the shelf.
  • Climb up the ladder.
  • Jump south again to the floorboards.
  • Climb down the ladder.
  • Go east through the rooms and walk across the washing line.
  • Climb down the ladder.
  • Push the wall to the north and walk across the floor.
  • Climb up the shelf to the north.
  • Climb down the shelf on the north-eastern side, below the floor.
  • Jump to the floorboards to the north-west.
  • Jump to the floorboards to the north.
  • Go north-west and then east (around a gap in the floor) and jump to the floorboards.
  • Climb up the ladder.
  • Search the western wall to find a ladder top.
  • Climb down the ladder you came up, then repair the nearby broken ladder using the ladder piece. Then climb down the fixed ladder. You are now in sector three
  • Open the door and go north and slightly west, then north to a house with a fireplace in it. (go up the ladder if you need a knife)
  • Go west through the door into the next room, then north out of the house until you see a barricade.
  • Go east past the sickle logo and the house directly south should have a ladder inside. Climb up the ladder.
  • Jump to the floorboards to the east.
  • Climb down the stairs.
  • Go south along the eastern side of the stairs. Search the wall. Use your knife on the wall, then push it.
  • Press the decorated wall on the northern side.
  • Open the lumpy rug (south-east square of the green rug).
  • Climb down the trapdoor to enter the hideout.

Myreque meetings[edit | edit source]

Please Note: You may have to select chat option 2 in order to receive the note from Vertida. Double check your quest log to make sure it's updated, or else you'll have to re-run the entire course again!

  • Run north and talk to Vertida Sefalatis.
  • Travel back to Burgh de Rott.
  • Talk to Veliaf Hurtz in the basement of the pub again.

Urgent business[edit | edit source]

Path to the ladder.
  • Travel to the Paterdomus temple (fairy ring CKS).
  • Talk to Drezel in Paterdomus, underneath the temple.
  • Take the west exit, past the monuments. Or, with level 65 agility, exit toward Canifis and take the shortcut up the side of the temple.
  • Search the bush in front of the steps leading to the church. Cutscene
  • Return to speak with Drezel, he will give you runes to teleport to Varrock.
  • Teleport to Varrock and talk to King Roald in the palace. ( 1•4•1)…
    1Talk to the King about Morytania.
    4What should I do now?
    1Yes, thanks, I'll accept the free teleport.
  • Talk to Veliaf Hurtz in Burgh de Rott.

Back to Meiyerditch[edit | edit source]

Items Needed: Pickaxe (optional), 4 free inventory spaces. Note: if using RuneLite, switch off low detail when searching for sickle logos on the castle wall.

Recommended: Combat equipment to protect and heal against Vanstrom Klause

  • Return to Meiyerditch and speak to a Vyrewatch. ( 1)…
    1Send me to the mines!
  • Talk to a Meiyerditch miner to get a pickaxe if you don't have one. ( 3)…
    3How do you get out of here?
  • Mine the daeyalt rocks on the walls until you get 15 daeyalt ore.
  • Use all 15 ores on the mine cart, then talk to a Vampyre Juvinate.
  • Run to the Myreque Hideout, marked on the map to the right. Follow the blue path from north to south.
  • Go south through 3 doors and up the ladder.
  • Jump to the floorboards to the east, climb down the stairs and enter the hideout.
  • Talk to Vertida. ( 1)…
    1Okay, lead the way.
  • Climb down the ladder, out the door, run south and climb over the wall rubble where you came in to Meiyerditch.
  • Run south and climb up the floor.
  • Run north up the slope and climb down the ladder.
  • Search the rocky surface.
  • Go north through the barricade and up the ladder.
  • Keep running north along the wall, up then down some ladders. And climb the castle wall. Talk to Safalaan at the very end and make sure you have 4 free inventory spaces.
  • Run west along the wall clockwise until you see a sickle logo on the walls on the north side of the castle.
  • Use the papyrus on the charcoal.
  • Do the same for the west and south sickles. Note: Pray melee before beginning the final sketch to avoid taking damage from Vanstrom Klause.
  • Cutscene. Let Vanstrom attack you a bit which will knock you out.
  • Go back and finish your final sketch.
  • Talk to Sarius if she didn't automatically talk to you when Vanstrom knocked you out
  • Speak to a nearby Vyrewatch and use the mine technique to get back to the base.
  • Walk to the house directly south-west of the house with the ladder leading to the Myreque Hideout. It contains a fireplace and a portrait on its south wall.
  • Use your knife on the fireplace. (There is a knife spawn upstairs)
  • Use your knife on the portrait for a large ornate key. If you don't automatically obtain the key, inspect it.
  • Return to the Myreque Hideout and talk to Safalaan again. ( 2)…
    2I have a message for you Safalaan - it may be important.
    . Afterwards, give him the message.

Locating the laboratory[edit | edit source]

Items Needed: Knife, Large ornate key. One law rune and one air rune are available in the Broken rune case for Telekinetic Grab (standard spellbook).

  • Exit the base, climb up the stairs, jump the gap, then climb down the ladder and travel north towards the mine until you find a bright, red and yellow tapestry inside a building adjacent to the Eastern city wall.
  • Slash the tapestry with your knife.
  • Walk through it and use the key on the statue.
  • Climb-down the staircase and telegrab the Haemalchemy book - runes can be found in the rune case.
  • Return to the base and talk to Safalaan one final time and give him the book.

Finishing up[edit | edit source]

  • Take the message from Safalaan to Veliaf in Burgh de Rott. ( 1)…
    1I have a message for you from Safalaan.

Congratulations, quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 2 Quest points
  • 7,000 Agility experience
  • 6,000 Thieving experience
  • 2,000 Construction experience
  • Tome of experience, granting 2,000 experience to any three skills of the player's choosing (level 30 or over). Can be the same skill.

Required for completing[edit | edit source]

Completion of Darkness of Hallowvale is required for the following:

  • A Taste of Hope
  • Burgh de Rott Ramble (Temple Trekking)
v • d • e

Citizen outfit

  • Citizen trousers
  • Citizen shoes

  • Vyrewatch legs
  • Vyrewatch shoes

Rewards

Locations

  • Meiyerditch

  • Meiyerditch Laboratories
Music
  • The Last Shanty
  • Lament of Meiyerditch
  • Night of the Vampyre
  • Morytanian Mystery
  • Domain of the Vampyres
Related

rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
{{Quick Guide}}

==Details==
{{Quest details page|Darkness of Hallowvale}}

==Walkthrough==
===Starting out===
'''''Items needed:''' 2 [[planks]], 8 [[nails]] and a [[hammer]]''
{{Checklist|
*Travel to [[Burgh de Rott]].
*Talk to [[Veliaf Hurtz]] in the Burgh de Rott pub basement. {{Chat option|4Is there something I can do to help out?|1Yes, please tell me more.|1What is the Sanguinesti region?|2How can I search for the Sanguinesti order of the Myreque?|3Can you tell me about the Sanguinesti Myreque?|4How should I get into the Sanguinesti region?|5Okay, thanks.}}
*Go south-east to the docks where there's a hut with a boat in it.
*Use a plank on the boat.
*Use a plank on the boat chute.
*Push the boat down the chute, then board it.
}}
===Welcome to Meiyerditch===
''Note: While in Meiyerditch if you are provoked by a [[Vyrewatch]] you can log out to avoid any interactions with them.''
{{Checklist|
*Go north-west a short distance (still on the pier), search the floor then kick it down and climb down.
*Climb over the wall rubble and talk to any [[Meiyerditch citizen]]. {{Chat option|4(whisper) Do you know about the Myreque?|4(whisper) I really need to meet the Myreque.|4How can Old Man Ral help me?}}
*Talk to [[Old Man Ral]] to the north. {{Chat option|4Someone said you could help me.|4Old Man Ral, the sage of Sanguinesti.}}
*Climb up the ladder in the building south-west of Old Man Ral.
}}

===The sickle logo agility course===
[[File:Darkness of Hallowvale map.png|thumb|250px|A map of Meiyerditch.]]
'''''Items Needed:''' Knife (obtainable during the course)''

*''Click on the following actions to mark them as completed ''

{{Checklist|
*Jump south to the floorboards.
*Jump east to the floorboards.
*Go to the north-east corner of the room, push the wall and go across the gap.
*Crawl under the wall to the north.
*Go north to the second room, look on the west side, push the wall and walk across it.
*Climb down the ladder.
*Search the table next to the wall, open the trapdoor table, and climb into it.
*Climb up the shelf.
*Crawl under the wall to the east side.
*Jump to the floorboards to the east.
*Climb down the ladder.
*Search the pots near the eastern door to get a [[Door key (Darkness of Hallowvale)|door key]] and use it to open the door.
*Climb up the ladder in the room to the east.
*Jump south to the floorboards.
*Go east, south, west and climb up the shelf.
*Climb up the ladder.
*Jump south again to the floorboards.
*Climb down the ladder.
*Go east through the rooms and walk across the washing line.
*Climb down the ladder.
*Push the wall to the north and walk across the floor.
*Climb up the shelf to the north.
*Climb down the shelf on the north-eastern side, below the floor.
*Jump to the floorboards to the north-west.
*Jump to the floorboards to the north.
*Go north-west and then east (around a gap in the floor) and jump to the floorboards.
*Climb up the ladder.
*Search the western wall to find a [[ladder top]].
*Climb down the ladder you came up, then repair the nearby broken ladder using the ladder piece. Then climb down the fixed ladder. You are now in sector three
*Open the door and go north and slightly west, then north to a house with a fireplace in it. (go up the ladder if you need a knife)
*Go west through the door into the next room, then north out of the house until you see a barricade.
*Go east past the sickle logo and the house directly south should have a ladder inside. Climb up the ladder.
*Jump to the floorboards to the east.
*Climb down the stairs.
*Go south along the eastern side of the stairs. Search the wall. Use your knife on the wall, then push it.
*Press the decorated wall on the northern side.
*Open the lumpy rug (south-east square of the green rug).
*Climb down the trapdoor to enter the hideout.
}}

===Myreque meetings===
'''Please Note:''' You may have to select chat option 2 in order to receive the note from Vertida. Double check your quest log to make sure it's updated, or else you'll have to re-run the entire course again!
{{Checklist|
*Run north and talk to [[Vertida Sefalatis]].
*Travel back to [[Burgh de Rott]].
*Talk to [[Veliaf Hurtz]] in the basement of the pub again. }}

===Urgent business===
[[File:Darkness of Hallowvale - route to lab.png|thumb|right|Path to the ladder.]]
{{Checklist|
*Travel to the [[Paterdomus]] temple (fairy ring CKS).
*Talk to [[Drezel]] in [[Paterdomus]], underneath the temple.
*Take the west exit, past the monuments. Or, with level 65 agility, exit toward Canifis and take the shortcut up the side of the temple.
*Search the [[Bush (Darkness of Hallowvale)|bush]] in front of the steps leading to the church. ''Cutscene''
*Return to speak with Drezel, he will give you runes to teleport to [[Varrock]].
*Teleport to [[Varrock]] and talk to [[King Roald]] in the palace. {{Chat option|1Talk to the King about Morytania.|4What should I do now?|1Yes, thanks, I'll accept the free teleport.}}
*Talk to Veliaf Hurtz in Burgh de Rott. }}

===Back to Meiyerditch===
'''''Items Needed:''' Pickaxe (optional), 4 free inventory spaces. Note: if using RuneLite, switch off low detail when searching for sickle logos on the castle wall.''

'''''Recommended:''' Combat equipment to protect and heal against [[Vanstrom Klause]]''{{Checklist|*Return to Meiyerditch and speak to a Vyrewatch. {{Chat option|1Send me to the mines!}}
*Talk to a [[Meiyerditch miner]] to get a pickaxe if you don't have one. {{Chat option|3How do you get out of here?}}
*Mine the [[daeyalt rock]]s on the walls until you get 15 [[daeyalt ore]].
*Use all 15 ores on the mine cart, then talk to a [[Vampyre Juvinate]].
*Run to the Myreque Hideout, marked on the map to the right. Follow the blue path from north to south.
*Go south through 3 doors and up the ladder.
*Jump to the floorboards to the east, climb down the stairs and enter the hideout.
*Talk to Vertida. {{Chat option|1Okay, lead the way.}}
*Climb down the ladder, out the door, run south and climb over the wall rubble where you came in to Meiyerditch.
*Run south and climb up the floor.
*Run north up the slope and climb down the ladder.
*Search the rocky surface.
*Go north through the barricade and up the ladder.
*Keep running north along the wall, up then down some ladders. And climb the castle wall. Talk to Safalaan at the very end and make sure you have 4 free inventory spaces.
*Run west along the wall clockwise until you see a sickle logo on the walls on the '''north''' side of the castle.
*Use the papyrus on the charcoal.
*Do the same for the west and south sickles. Note: Pray melee before beginning the final sketch to avoid taking damage from Vanstrom Klause.
*Cutscene. Let Vanstrom attack you a bit which will knock you out.
*Go back and '''finish your final sketch.'''
*Talk to Sarius if she didn't automatically talk to you when Vanstrom knocked you out
*Speak to a nearby Vyrewatch and use the mine technique to get back to the base.
*Walk to the house directly south-west of the house with the ladder leading to the Myreque Hideout. It contains a fireplace and a [[Portrait (Darkness of Hallowvale)|portrait]] on its south wall.
*Use your knife on the fireplace. (There is a knife spawn upstairs)
*Use your knife on the portrait for a [[large ornate key]]. If you don't automatically obtain the key, inspect it. 
*Return to the Myreque Hideout and talk to Safalaan again. {{Chat option|2I have a message for you Safalaan - it may be important.}}. Afterwards, give him the message.
}}

===Locating the laboratory===
'''''Items Needed:''' Knife, Large ornate key. One [[law rune]] and one [[air rune]] are available in the [[Broken rune case]] for [[Telekinetic Grab]] ([[standard spellbook]]).''
{{Checklist|
*Exit the base, climb up the stairs, jump the gap, then climb down the ladder and travel north towards the mine until you find a bright, red and yellow tapestry inside a building adjacent to the Eastern city wall.
*Slash the tapestry with your knife.
*Walk through it and use the key on the statue.
*Climb-down the staircase and telegrab the Haemalchemy book - runes can be found in the rune case.
*Return to the base and talk to Safalaan one final time and give him the book.
}}

===Finishing up===
{{Checklist|
*Take the message from Safalaan to Veliaf in Burgh de Rott. {{Chat option|1I have a message for you from Safalaan.}}}}
Congratulations, quest complete!

==Rewards==
{{Quest rewards page|Darkness of Hallowvale}}

==Required for completing==
Completion of Darkness of Hallowvale is required for the following: 
*[[A Taste of Hope]]
*Burgh de Rott Ramble ([[Temple Trekking]])

{{Darkness of Hallowvale}}
